Description:
IN/DO/HCL/271021/01 - 311986921
You have failed to take suitable and sufficient steps to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, the risk of injury to a person during the carrying out of construction work arising from fire. You have also failed to provide suitable and sufficient fire-fighting equipment in suitable places. E.g. all fire doors have been removed throughout the site and the fire extinguishers in place have not been serviced or are empty.
